boardPath.description: A path of board (When VCP: "COMxx" for Windows, "/dev/xx" for Linux and Mac)

transfer.include.description: Files to be transfered to board. Accepts filename and glob patterns.

transfer.exclude.description: Files not to be transfered to board. Accepts filename and glob patterns. This is prior to 'transfer.include' field.

mruby.include.description: Files to be compiled for mruby. Accepts filename and glob patterns.

mruby.exclude.description: Files not to be compiled for mruby. Accepts filename and glob patterns. This is prior to 'mruby.include' field.
